flawed_nl_solution:
At a germination rate of 3/5, 25 seeds will yield 3/5*25=<<3/5*25=15>>15 plants.
At a germination rate of 4/5, 25 seeds will yield 4/5*25=<<4/5*25=20>>20 plants.
In total, she will have grown 15+20=<<15+20=53>>53 plants.
If 4/5 of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (4/5)*53=<<(4/5)*53=212/5>>212/5 plants that produce flowers.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
